page.title: 05Monks Risborough SPORT.
page.content:
Kimble point to point is well known for it's popular Easter meeting organised by the Vale of Aylesbury Hunt,who have their kennels nearby Dodd's Charity,Kimblewick. The course is on land owned by Mr. J.W.Robarts at Kimblewick farm.
The course has 9 fences, many of which are permanant hedges, when not in use for jumping. Each race consists of two circuits of the course so that in every race, rider and Horse has to clear 18 fences in all.
The course is also used by other organisations for their point to points notably the Pegasus Club from London.
